title: Demonstration-Based Language Training Program: Strengthening Practical Skills Through Observational Learning and Active Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language knowledge and simple communication skills
context.additional_context: A real-time collaborative and feedback environment utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify core strategies presented in demonstration videos with at least 80% accuracy when performing language tasks
Learners collaborate with peers to utilize at least three target language structures in role-play projects based on demonstration content
Through post-reflection activities, learners evaluate skills acquired from demonstration-based learning at a level of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) using a self-assessment rubric
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
